about_the_game:
Your spaceship may be busted, but that’s not stopping you! Travel through bizarre alien planets, each with its own dangers, weird creatures, and strange landscapes. Who knows what secrets (or trouble) you’ll find?

Lost in space? Bring a buddy along! Play solo or with a friend in 2-player co-op and work together to solve challenges, escape enemies, and (hopefully) not get lost in space forever.

Not everything in space wants to be your friend. Some creatures and aliens are out to stop you—stomp, dodge, and outsmart them to survive!

Your family of fellow sheep is waiting for you back on planet earth! Jump, fight, and parkour your way through unknown worlds as you inch closer to home. Do you have what it takes to make it back?

A small project with big dreams! SPACESHEEP started as a school project, but thanks to our love for games (and a lot of late-night coding), it made its way to Steam. Your support means the world!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13+ (High Sierra and later)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU (Intel HD Graphics or Apple M1 GPU)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio device
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11 (Big Sur) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Apple M1/M2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU or Apple M1/M2 integrated GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio device

short_description: You are a brave sheep who was sent to space by the USSR to test a new spaceship, but it veered off course and crashed on an alien planet! You must travel across strange worlds and fend off enemies to make it back to Earth safely.
